trans-unit.source: Provides a message property that accumulates additional correlation information for a message as protocols are applied, such as when data is returned from a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.MessageQuerySet"></xref> over the incoming message.
The correlation data accumulated by the CorrelationDataMessageProperty augments the message contents when calculating instance keys that relate messages to other messages.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> class.
Adds a correlation data provider to the property’s private dictionary of providers.
The name of the correlation data provider.
The correlation data provider.
Adds correlation data to the specified message.

If the message has a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty> then the correlation data is added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty>; otherwise, a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty> is added that includes the correlation data.
The message to modify.
The name of the correlation data provider.
The correlation data provider.

Initializes and returns a new <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> instance that is a copy of the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> instance.
The new instance.
Gets the name of this message property: “CorrelationDataMessageProperty”.
The string value “CorrelationDataMessageProperty”.
Removes a correlation data provider from the private dictionary of data providers.
The name of the data provider to remove.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the remove operation was successful; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Attempts to get a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> from the specified message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties*>.
The message that contains the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties*> to inspect.

When this method returns, contains the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> contained the specified message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties*>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Properties*> property contains a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> class; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Attempts to get the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> from the specified message properties.
The message properties to inspect.

When this method returns, contains the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> contained by the specified message properties; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the message properties contain a <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Attempts to retrieve the specified correlation data provider from the private dictionary of data providers.
The name of the data provider.
When this method returns, contains the value of the data provider if it is present; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
This parameter is passed uninitialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.CorrelationDataMessageProperty"></xref> contains the specified correlation data provider; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
